name: Haley Marie
text: Excellent food and awesome staff. Exceptional customer service. There was a mixup with our order and the staff went out of their way to fix it, getting the right order to us quickly. Food was hot and delicious (:

name: Marla Jean
text: Always do a great job delivering us pizza. Yummy food. Salads rock.

name: Willon Lewis Bonds
text: Delicious change of taste from typical delivery chains. Pleasantly surprised! Definitely my choice of delivery pizza and wings!

name: Angie Gil
text: Waited an hour and a half for our delivery order, after being told it would be there in 30 minutes. Called at the hour point and couldn't get through for a half hour, only to be told the driver couldn't find our house (after they made us ‚Ä¶More

text: My 1st visit after hearing my parents rave about Marco's pizza. I would say if you like the more natural taste of pizza, similar to Papa John's, then you'll probably like Marco's. They do have a lot of other items; like subs, salads and ‚Ä¶More

name: Morgan Stephens
text: It was very delicious and I really enjoyed it but it was really really slow would not recommend if your in a hurry

name: Cameron Briggs
text: We like a lot hanging out. Last night we  found this fine place which we didn‚Äôt know before. We passed a beautiful evening there with very good cooking and a well-trained team and a great  chef. We  added this restaurant in our list  and we will certainly return soon. We highly recommend.

text: I celebrated my PhD yesterday in this great restaurant. happy to tell that we had a delightful evening and the venue was evidently one of the reasons for this fruitful meeting. The waiters  contributed in a sweet style, the meals were ‚Ä¶More

text: We normally love this place cause the pizza is pretty good and the cheese sticks are pretty good for the price. But the last two times we have had issues.... the first time we ordered wings and they were burnt, and this time we paid extra ‚Ä¶More

name: 0311nwe
text: Great pizza the dough is what makes it!

name: Craig Brown
text: Just tried them for the first time just to see how they compare to the Hut, Dominos, Papa John's, etc. ‚Ä¶More

name: Brooke Thompson
text: Usually very pleased with Marcos. This time the person that took the order was very rude. I also asked for 2 garlic sauce, only received one, which was opened and dumping all over the pizza box. Didn‚Äôt notice til half way home. Think I‚Äôll stick with a different place next time.

name: Britan Cox
text: Usually they do pretty good. But this time we ordered 2 pepperoni with romasean crust. Both of our pizzas didn‚Äôt have romasean crust, and one of our pizzas looked absolutely sloppy with not near enough pepperoni, and both were not cut like at all. Common. Step it up Marcos!

name: Kassadie Anderson
text: Pizza was overpriced and all crust even though we paid for extra toppings.  Would not recommend and wont be ordering from here again.

name: HAYDEN PAGE
text: Wings were dry. Some burned. Pizza was bland and ok. Bread sticks pretty generic. Definitely a "chain pizza" place. Most likely wouldn't eat here again. Very average taste.

name: Ally Broskey
text: Depends on who answered my phone call. I live a few miles up the street from this location. One time I call and they can deliver. Five days later they tell me they can't because I am out of the area. I explained the system is messing up ‚Ä¶More

name: Destiny Martinez
text: We love marcos but this one has by far the worst customer service food is really good and cooked great but they always seem in such a grumpy mood.

name: Donna Jensen
text: We had Marco's Pizza tonight for the first time. Best pizza we've had in a long time and the brownie.....mmmmmm.  Highly recommend!!

name: Jackie Contreras
text: My family decided to eat at Marcos pizza after my sons soccer game. There was only one employee at the time and we order quite a few things! This employee was fast and the food was great! His customer service skills are amazing! His name is ‚Ä¶More

name: Corpsegrinder 13
text: Went inside and ordered 2 pizzas, 2 subs, and some wings. Service was great and the food took about 15min to make. All of the food was great, especially the subs! Would recommend!

name: Sierra Schlager
text: Love the pizza here!! But was disappointed to be put on hold for 10 minutes just to hang up and walk in and all the staff was sitting around playing on phones and eating.

name: Seth Jones
text: So glad there is a marco's pizza near me. It is slowly becoming my favorite. I especially love the Greek dressing they use.

name: Norman S Hall
text:
The Pizza was burnt Black on the bottom
The Greek salad was mostly lettuce with a couple
of sprinkles of cheese and two slices of tomato ‚Ä¶More

name: Brady Haws
text: You can‚Äôt go wrong with a Marco‚Äôs XL big cheese with all the crust add ons. I love that they don‚Äôt charge for adding stuff to the crust. Join their rewards program to earn money off future orders and get coupons. It‚Äôs our go to pizza place when we order pizza for lunch at work!

name: Breanna Bouwhuis
text: Every single time I have came to this location I am stuck waiting for absolutely ever! Some of the staff are very disrespectful and just don‚Äôt seem to care. A lady stood next to me while waiting for several minutes and didn‚Äôt get absolutely ‚Ä¶More

name: Mary Read
text: This location is a little new, but the staff are always welcoming, polite, professional. The pizza is the best delivery you can get. Went in and was helped by Brock who really provided us with a Promo experience!

name: John Dosset
text: We had to wait a bit on our order but the manager Chris recognized this and offered a sincere heartfelt apology. He gave us a complimentary drink without making excuses. He took care of us twice over. The pizza and salad were delicious. We will definitely return.

name: Cheryl Hagman
text: As from me being from NY... I gave you guys a try. I ordered anchovies on my salad (this is a NY thing), the girl kept saying how gross it was to other employees (Maybe keep it to yourself next time). The croutons were great, but the pizza ‚Ä¶More

name: Brianna Kent
text: Their pizza is delicious. Cost is affordable and that makes it a double win. Crust is perfect. Sauce and cheese blend is gourmet. Seriously, go get 2 of their $6.99 mediums (8") and you will be blown away by how good their food is!

name: Christopher Pessetto
text: Do not go here. Terrible customer service and no regard for getting your order correct. I ordered a pizza and a salad for my wife. When I picked up my order they did not give me my salad. I asked if I could get a refund for my item not ‚Ä¶More

name: Jeff Toplak
text: I went as a Uber Eats pickup so I am not rating on the food just service. I got the order while I was in Ogden. I went over there and the pizza still was not ready. Waited about 5-10 minutes before the one kid says to the other that they ‚Ä¶More

name: Clint
text: I had a bad day and came here a half hour before closing, not expecting much. The employees were amazing and made me a small meatlovers pizza that definitely bested the bigger pizza chains in the area. The crust flavoring was great too, comparable to  restaurants I've been to in large cities.

name: Brandi Colf
text: They forgot parts of our order. So we called said they would get it right out. An hour later we called because they still hadn't shown said they would get it right out. We waited over an hour for the initial delivery and then over another ‚Ä¶More

name: Ashley Conrad
text: Employees are friendly enough, but I have to say the time it takes for orders to be completed is TERRIBLE. There were 3 workers today with no other customers and maybe one other order. By the time I arrived my order (only 2 items by the ‚Ä¶More

name: Justin Hackworth
text: It's not AWESOME, but it is good pizza and I would choose it over Pizza hut or Domino's any time. They are friendly and clean and prices are reasonable.

name: Phil Culver
text:
Update 5/29/19  Marco's corporate did respond to me and said they wanted to make it right.  The problem is that I just don't like their pizza.
There is nothing they could do to make it right for me.  This is simply a ‚Ä¶More

name: DotP Cyphus
text: I'm done w/ Marco's.  My wife cannot eat red sauce, we have twice ordered white sauce via DoorDash only to get the pizza delivered with red sauce and forced to order/prepare something alternative for her to eat.  Last night was the last ‚Ä¶More

name: Mitchell Brown
text: This was the first time I went there and might be my last. I called in my order ahead and they they told me it would be about 20 to 30 min. It wouldn't have been so bad if it didn't end up taking a hour and thirty minutes to get my order. ‚Ä¶More

name: Natsha Paskett
text: Truly love the pizza. The only thing that upsets me is that they said you can pick up your pizza in between 6:30 and 6:40 and we left there at almost 7:10 after. And there was only five people on staff and two of them were delivery drivers. One delivery driver was trying to help out. The other one didn't want to do anything.

name: Anton Hinckley
text: It wasn't the worst pizza I have ever had, but they burned it slightly and the bread and sauce tasted wrong. They also had horrible service. They said it would be ready by 11 and it was ready by 11:45, and at the time there was no other ‚Ä¶More

name: Slayne s
text: Excellent pizza and great staff.!

name: MaKessa Madsen
text: Went there for the first time and the staff was very welcoming and made sure all our needs were met. We didnt have to wait very long for everything to be made. They made sure we saw our order was how we wanted it before we left. The quality of the food was very good.

name: Travis Finster
text: Decent food and selection, but half of the time something is wrong or missing on a delivery.

name: Rabbit
text: Yo this place was good but somebody tell hormel (meat supplier) to treat the pigs better üêñüê∑

name: Houston Crudele
text: This is some of the best pizza around and trust me we have tried it all!

name: Steve Cox
text: Tired of all the standard pizza around here using terrible dough with no flavor no texture. Many have been pushing pizza through ovens too quickly and isn't exactly done cooking. Marco's fixed all that.

name: Scott Christensen
text: I am given them a one star because the pizza is nothing special first off. Especially for 70 bucks for four pizzas. The majority of the pizza was crust not so much on toppings. The other big issue we ordered online and there was glitch in ‚Ä¶More

name: Amanda Woods
text: The thin crust is cooked to perfection.  The toppings are fresh and the service was super quick. Marco's is yummy!

name: Kevin Mickelsen
text:
My new preferred place to get pizza from. Their ‚ÄúChicken Fresco‚Äù pizza is my favorite!
Any time I mention pizza as a dinner idea, I cross my fingers that it‚Äôs from Marco‚Äôs!!!

name: Sandra Morrison
text: Love their cheese. Nice and stringy and they don't skimp on it. Timing was right on for pickup. Pepperoni was done properly.

name: Lisa Eberly
text: Hans and Carson are the men!!!! They were so great and quick to service! So friendly and nice. Never had better customer service!!!

text: We ordered a pizza, an hr and half later we called,  they never put the order in. They said it would be another 30 minutes,  another hr goes by and called again, they lost are pizzas again. Seriously 3 hrs later and still nothing. Got a notification afterwards, that they canceled our order. What a joke

name: felice franco
text: I usually love it but this time it wasn't as hot an I asked for extra croutons didn't get them an one pizza had maybe 10 pieces of pineapple not too happy I picked my order up like I always do!!!

text:
We enjoyed the thin crust and the

text: Better call ahead as they have hours posted but they are often closed before they say there are I ha e driven there several times to find they are closed!

text: Good if slightly over priced pizza, there were only there lose working, not an adult in sight and they were slammed; the phone was ringing off the hook, there was a line out the door and the poor kids were really doing their best.  There'd be a fifth star if there'd been a manager there to help out.

name: Brady Maw

text: The workers were very nice and the bbq wings were great.  Wasnt impressed with the pizza. As i opened the box i smelled tomato sauce . Not pizza sauce.  The pizza was kind of bland unfortunately.

text: Great pizza and they got our pizza out to us fast, the place is really clean too!

name: Monica Widdison
text: Pizza is really good, service wasn't great. Is it too much to ask for someone to smile and do their job? 5 standing around while 1 kid was working.

name: Agent Kevin Raat
text: This place has the best pizza in utah. I do however have a way to help this place make lots of money. Only do it for 1 day though. Make pizza the same price as little ceasers pizza "hot n ready" then sit back and watch howw fast sales are boosted.

text: Best pizza place by far. Great pizza. Even better people watching! Experience listening/watching a obtuse large male getting heated/hangry because there 10min slower. Also getting yelled at dojo Douglas because I'm standing outside his dojo. BEST PIZZA EXSPERENCE EVER!!!!!!
